content: k1 sole knit for all sizes instep knit sole knit there are now 29 33 35 stitches on both needles round 1 k1 ssk knit to last three stitches k2tog k1 round 2 knit repeat these two rounds until 15 stitches remain on each needle graft stitches using kitchener stitch congratulations sock one is complete standard babble at the end this pattern is provided for your personal use it has not been test knit so if you find a problem or have any questions please contact me on ravelry i am anotherewe
